page.title: 03Taxis (continued)
page.content: There are two taxi ranks in Immingham; the Civic Centre and the County Hotel. During the day, the Civic Centre is the busiest but the County Hotel is the busiest at night. Many of the taxi drivers in Immingham are part-timers and they may have another job as well. One of the most annoying incidents when driving a taxi is the time when the fare you go to pick up has already taken another taxi or has simply disappeared when you arrive. There are many amusing things which can happen especially when people have had too much to drink.Many taxi drivers are regularly called out in the middle of the night but it is all part of the job. (Written and researched by Liam Hiles and John Mummery.)
